hero.title: Safety & Privacy
hero.subtitle: Your security, discretion, and peace of mind are our highest priorities

intro.paragraph1: At LIEN, we've built our platform on a foundation of trust, transparency, and uncompromising safety. We understand that discretion isn't just a preference—it's essential. Whether meeting someone for the first time at our lounge or continuing an evening elsewhere, you deserve to feel secure every step of the way.
intro.paragraph2: Below, you'll find detailed information about our safety measures, privacy protocols, and the steps we take to ensure a secure, respectful experience for everyone.

safetyPage.feature1Desc: All members and companions undergo thorough ID verification before accessing the platform. No anonymous accounts—everyone is who they say they are.
safetyPage.feature2Desc: All messages between members and companions are end-to-end encrypted. Your conversations remain completely private and confidential.
safetyPage.feature3Desc: Every initial meeting takes place at our Roppongi lounge—a safe, elegant public space. Never meet strangers in private locations.
safetyPage.feature4Desc: All communication happens through our secure platform until after your first meeting. No pressure to share personal contact information prematurely.
safetyPage.feature5Desc: Companions undergo additional screening to ensure quality and safety. Members verified through ID and payment method validation.
safetyPage.feature6Desc: Our support team available around the clock. Report concerns instantly through the platform—we respond immediately.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
privacy.subtitle: Your information protected with industry-leading security
privacy.data1: Bank-level encryption (256-bit SSL) for all data transmission and storage
privacy.data2: GDPR and CCPA compliant—you control your information
privacy.data3: No selling or sharing of personal data with third parties, ever
privacy.data4: Secure payment processing through verified, PCI-compliant providers
privacy.data5: Automatic data anonymization and regular security audits
privacy.gdprNote: As a platform operating in Japan with international members, we adhere to the strictest global privacy standards including GDPR (EU) and CCPA (California). You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time.

guidelines.title: Safety Guidelines for Members
guidelines.subtitle: Best practices for a secure, enjoyable experience

safetyPage.guideline1: Always meet first at our Roppongi lounge—never agree to meet strangers in private locations initially.
safetyPage.guideline2: Keep all communication on-platform until after you've met in person and feel comfortable sharing personal contact information.
safetyPage.guideline3: Trust your instincts. If something feels off, you're under no obligation to continue the meeting.
safetyPage.guideline4: Inform a trusted friend of your plans. Share general details (who, where, when) for added safety.
safetyPage.guideline5: Respect boundaries and consent. What happens after the initial meeting is mutual—both parties must enthusiastically agree.
safetyPage.guideline6: Report suspicious behavior immediately. Our team investigates all reports seriously.

privacyPage.intro: At LIEN, your privacy is paramount. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. We are committed to transparency and compliance with global privacy standards, including GDPR (EU), CCPA (California), and Japan's APPI.
privacyPage.section1Content:
We collect:

**Account Information:**
• Full name, email, phone number
• Date of birth (for age verification)
• Government-issued ID (for identity verification)
• Payment information (processed through secure third-party providers)

**Profile Information:**
• Photos you upload
• Preferences, interests, biographical information
• Saved favorites and bookmarks

**Usage Data:**
• Pages visited, features used, time spent
• Device information (IP address, browser type, OS)
• Cookies and similar tracking technologies

**Communications:**
• Messages exchanged on the platform (encrypted)
• Support requests and correspondence
privacyPage.section2Content:
We use your information to:

• Provide and improve our services
• Verify your identity and prevent fraud
• Process payments and manage subscriptions
• Facilitate connections between members and companions
• Communicate important updates and security alerts
• Ensure safety and enforce our Terms of Service
• Comply with legal obligations

We do NOT:
• Sell your personal information to third parties
• Share your data with advertisers
• Use your information for unrelated purposes
privacyPage.section3Content:
We may share your information only in limited circumstances:

**With Other Users:**
• Your profile information is visible to other verified members
• Messages you send are visible only to the recipient (encrypted)

**With Service Providers:**
• Payment processors (e.g., Stripe)
• Cloud storage providers (e.g., AWS)
• Email service providers
• All providers contractually obligated to protect your data

**For Legal Compliance:**
• When required by law (court orders, subpoenas)
• To protect safety and rights of LIEN, users, or public
privacyPage.section4Content:
We implement industry-leading security measures:

• 256-bit SSL encryption for all data transmission
• End-to-end encryption for in-platform messaging
• Secure, encrypted storage of sensitive information
• Regular security audits and penetration testing
• Restricted access to personal data (authorized personnel only)
• Multi-factor authentication for admin accounts
privacyPage.section5Content:
We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. After account deletion:

• Immediately remove your profile from public view
• Delete or anonymize personal data within 30 days
• Retain certain data longer only if required by law
privacyPage.section6Content:
We use cookies to:

• Remember your login session and preferences
• Analyze usage patterns and improve the platform
• Provide personalized content

You can control cookie settings through your browser. We do NOT use third-party advertising cookies.
privacyPage.section7Content:
Depending on your location, you have rights including:

**GDPR (EU Residents):**
• Right to access your data
• Right to rectification (correction)
• Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")
• Right to data portability
• Right to object to processing

**CCPA (California Residents):**
• Right to know what data we collect
• Right to delete personal information
• Right to opt-out of data sales (we don't sell data)

**APPI (Japan Residents):**
• Right to disclosure of purpose
• Right to request correction or deletion

To exercise these rights, contact us at hello@lien.com. We will respond within 30 days.
privacyPage.section8Content: LIEN operates globally, and your data may be transferred to countries outside your own, including Japan, the United States, and the European Union. We ensure all transfers comply with applicable privacy laws through Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) and other lawful mechanisms.
privacyPage.section9Content: LIEN is strictly for adults 18 years and older. We do not knowingly collect information from anyone under 18. If we discover a minor has created an account, we will immediately terminate it and delete all associated data.
privacyPage.section10Content:
We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. When we make significant changes:

• We'll notify you via email
• Display a prominent notice on the platform
• Update the "Last Updated" date

Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

gdpr.title: Your Data Rights Summary
gdpr.description: Under GDPR, CCPA, and APPI, you have the following rights:
gdpr.right1: Access: Request a copy of all personal data we hold
gdpr.right2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
gdpr.right3: Deletion: Request permanent deletion of your account and data
gdpr.right4: Portability: Receive your data in a machine-readable format
gdpr.right5: Objection: Opt out of certain data processing activities
gdpr.right6: Withdrawal: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
